task1_youtube_transcripts_canada.title: September 15, 2025â€”Pushback on efforts to change Yukon mining laws

transcript_chunks.speaker: Reporter
transcript_chunks.text: Four years in, the Yukon government's efforts to revise its mining laws continues to meet friction from First Nations over consultation.

transcript_chunks.speaker: First Nations Leader
transcript_chunks.text: We demand meaningful consultation under section 35 before any changes to mining regulations.

transcript_chunks.speaker: Analyst
transcript_chunks.text: The Mineral Claims Consultation Framework aims to address duty to consult for hydro and mining projects.

task1_youtube_transcripts_canada.title: First Nations leaders comment following major projects summit

transcript_chunks.speaker: Indigenous Leader
transcript_chunks.text: At the summit, we discussed the need for early consultation on mining and hydro developments.

transcript_chunks.speaker: Panelist
transcript_chunks.text: Federal guidelines require accommodation where impacts on rights are anticipated.
